title: ICYMI - Roxane Gay on Providing Relief During the Pandemic with No-Questions-Asked Cash
itunes:title: ICYMI - Roxane Gay on Providing Relief During the Pandemic with No-Questions-Asked Cash
description:
Writer Roxane Gay discusses her effort to send money directly to individuals struggling from the economic effects of COVID-19 and reacts to her shout-out from Barack Obama.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
